directions: Put chicken breasts in a slow cooker and top with onion and barbeque sauce.
Cook on High for 4 hours. Shred chicken with 2 forks and continue cooking Low for 4 hours more.
ingredients: 1 1/4 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
1 cup chopped sweet onion (such as Vidalia®)
title: Shredded Barbeque Chicken
